additionalServices.name: Seasonal Check
additionalServices.description: Try out the new, innovative Ford Econo Check and see for yourself how easy it can be to reduce your Ford's fuel consumption. And also reduce your carbon footprint.

additionalServices.name: Full Air Conditioning Service
additionalServices.description: The air conditioning system in your Ford must be serviced at regular intervals. Your Ford Dealer offers you a comprehensive air conditioning check at a price that won?t hurt your wallet.

additionalServices.name: Front Wiper Blade Change
additionalServices.description: Keep your wiper blades in good condition to be sure to keep a clear view: you might not use your wiper blades every single day, but day in, day out they are exposed to the weather, sunlight and chemical elements in the air.

additionalServices.name: Ford Mobile Servicing
additionalServices.description: To drive safely, you need the right tyres in good condition, as they affect the steering, braking and acceleration of your vehicle. Worn tyres make it less predictable to drive and more likely to skid.

additionalServices.name: Courtesy Car
additionalServices.description: Stay mobile while your Ford is in the best hands with your Ford Dealer. Along with booking a service, make a reservation for a courtesy car while yours is being serviced.

additionalServices.name: Car Wash
additionalServices.description: We'll thoroughly wash your vehicle, removing all surface dirt with foams which are tough on dirt but gentle on paintwork and don't harm the environment.

additionalServices.name: Interim Check (Commercials only)
additionalServices.description: Your dealer can perform additional checks and changes at the same time as your scheduled service, to refresh and enhance your driving experience.

additionalServices.name: MOT With Service
additionalServices.description: You will get extra discount if you book MOT with any service and The compulsory MoT test certifies that your vehicle meets the necessary safety and roadworthiness requirements. The test has to be performed every year on vehicles over three years old.

additionalServices.name: MOT Emissions Test
additionalServices.description: The compulsory MoT Emissions test certifies that your vehicle meets the necessary safety and roadworthiness requirements. The test has to be performed every year on vehicles over three years old.

oldServices.name: Stand-alone MOT
oldServices.description:
If booked together with a Motorcraft Minor or Major service, enjoy an extra Â£5 off
Plus earn triple Nectar Points on the MOT (6 points per Â£1 spent)

oldServices.name: MOT with Service
oldServices.description:
If booked together with a Motorcraft Minor or Major service, enjoy an extra Â£5 off
Plus earn triple Nectar Points on the MOT (6 points per Â£1 spent)

mainServices.description:
{"Abstract":"

Major Service:<\/strong> A major Service is the most comprehensive service offered by Ford, ensuring your car is kept in optimal condition.<\/p>

Interim\/Standard Service:<\/strong> An Interim Service is performed by Ford-trained technicians and ensures your Ford will continue to perform perfectly.<\/p>
Undefined Service: <\/strong>Having your Ford serviced regularly at one of our Dealers can help to maintain its efficiency, improving fuel economy and reducing CO2 emissions.","Title":"Main service description"}
